wikipedia_page.main:
Marcus Roberts is a British actor from London, England. He has appeared in numerous TV shows and films in England and is recently gaining recognition in America. He was the main star of the TV Movie Oap Killer First Kill Last Kill that aired on Channel 5 TV.
He was interviewed in The Telegraph newspaper about taking on such a harrowing role.
He is on the social celebrity magazine WhoSay.
He is also in the top five percent of social media users according to Klear.
